original_text:
Neptune’s Fortune Megaways
Se dovessimo stilare una classifica dei temi più apprezzati dai giocatori di slot, di sicuro ai primi posti finirebbero i giochi ispirati ai racconti epici. Anche Neptune’s Fortune Megaways rientra in questo filone, visto che, come dice il titolo, il protagonista è Nettuno, signore del mare e delle tempeste, venerato dai romani ma anche dai greci sotto il nome di Poseidone.
Come di consuetudine, la ISoftBet ha fatto un ottimo lavoro dal punto di vista grafico, anche se dobbiamo dire che il vero punto forte della slot sta nel sistema di bonus offerto.
La griglia di gioco si trova sul fondo del mare, attorniata da alghe, coralli e altre piante acquatiche, con i jackpot sistemati sulla destra e i tasti per dare il via alla partita che si trovano invece sulla sinistra.
Caratteristiche di Neptune’s Fortune Megaways
In questa slot la griglia ha 5 rulli ma le righe possono variare tra 3 e 6. La puntata minima è di 20 gettoni e siamo noi a decidere il valore di ogni gettone. Se dovessimo propendere per il valore più basso, ossia 0,01 €, allora ogni spin ci costerebbe appena 0,20 €. Come tutte le slot Megaways, anche in questo caso i modi per vincere sono davvero tanti, ben 46.656!
La slot offre anche al possibilità di attivare tra i 5 e 1.000 giri automatici.
Il valore RTP è del 96,03% e la volatilità è alta, così che avremo vincite meno frequenti ma ricompense molto alte.
Simboli e funzionalità
Tra le caratteristiche di Neptune’s Fortune Megaways c’è la funzione a cascata, ossia dopo ogni combinazione pagante, i simboli vincenti esplodono e vengono sostituiti da altri.
I simboli sono di basso e alto valore. Come di consuetudine, al primo gruppo appartengono le carte da gioco dal 10 all’Asso, nel secondo gruppo troviamo invece le icone tematiche: la stella marina, la conchiglia, il polpo e Nettuno.
Il simbolo Wild è un’ostrica con all’interno una perla, sostituisce tutti i simboli eccetto lo Scatter e ogni volta che compare alcune bollicine salgono dalla sua bocca e casualmente vanno a sbattere contro uno dei quattro scrigni posti sopra la griglia di gioco. La maggior parte delle volte il baule si aprirà e ci regalerà un moltiplicatore compreso tra x2 e x5. Se si aprirà lo scrigno centrale, allora avremo la possibilità di vincere uno dei jackpot a disposizione:

Mini: 20x la puntata
Minor: 50x la puntata
Major: 200x la puntata
Grand: 1.000x la puntata

Lo Scatter è il tridente di Nettuno: se compare per quattro volte otteniamo 10 Free Spins, con cinque simboli avremo diritto a 12 Free Spins e con sei simboli i Free Spins sono 15.
Durante i giri gratuiti i simboli di basso valore vengono rimossi, e i Wild potranno continuare a regalare un moltiplicatore come nel gioco base.

raw_translation.response:
Neptune’s Fortune Megaways

If we were to rank the most popular themes among slot players, epic stories would definitely be at the top of the list. Neptune's Fortune Megaways is also part of this trend, as the title suggests, with the protagonist being Neptune, lord of the sea and storms, venerated by both the Romans and the Greeks under the name of Poseidon.

As usual, iSoftBet has done an excellent job graphically, although we must say that the real strength of the slot lies in the bonus system offered. The game grid is located at the bottom of the sea, surrounded by seaweed, corals, and other aquatic plants, with jackpots on the right and the start buttons on the left.

Features of Neptune's Fortune Megaways
In this slot, the grid has 5 reels, but the rows can vary between 3 and 6. The minimum bet is 20 coins, and we decide the value of each coin. If we opt for the lowest value, which is €0.01, each spin would only cost us €0.20. Like all Megaways slots, there are plenty of ways to win, with 46,656 in total. The slot also offers the option to activate between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins.

The RTP value is 96.03%, and the volatility is high, so we'll have less frequent wins but much higher rewards.

Symbols and functionality
Among the features of Neptune's Fortune Megaways is the cascade function, meaning that after each paying combination, winning symbols explode and are replaced by others.

The symbols are of low and high value. As usual, the first group includes playing cards from 10 to Ace, while the second group includes thematic icons: the starfish, the shell, the octopus, and Neptune.

The Wild symbol is an oyster with a pearl inside, substituting for all symbols except the Scatter. Whenever it appears, some bubbles rise from its mouth and randomly hit one of the four chests above the game grid. Most of the time, the chest will open and give us a multiplier between x2 and x5. If the central chest opens, then we will have a chance to win one of the available jackpots:

Mini: 20x the bet
Minor: 50x the bet
Major: 200x the bet
Grand: 1,000x the bet

The Scatter is Neptune's trident: if it appears four times, we get 10 Free Spins, with five symbols, we are entitled to 12 Free Spins, and with six symbols, the Free Spins are 15.

During Free Spins, low-value symbols are removed, and Wilds can continue to give us a multiplier as in the base game. 

Experience the thrill of Neptune's Fortune Megaways and dive into an epic underwater adventure where you can win big!

message.content:
Neptune’s Fortune Megaways

If we were to make a ranking list of the most popular themes for slot players, games inspired by epic tales would surely be at the top. Neptune's Fortune Megaways is one of these games, as the title suggests, featuring the protagonist Neptune, lord of the sea and storms, revered by the Romans and also by the Greeks under the name of Poseidon.

As usual, ISoftBet has done an excellent job from a graphic point of view, although we have to say that the real strength of the slot lies in the bonus system offered.

The game grid is located at the bottom of the sea, surrounded by seaweed, corals, and other aquatic plants, with jackpots placed on the right and the start buttons on the left.

Features of Neptune's Fortune Megaways

In this slot, the grid has 5 reels but the rows can vary between 3 and 6. The minimum bet is 20 coins and we can choose the value of each coin. If we were to opt for the lowest value, i.e. €0.01, then each spin would cost us just €0.20. Like all Megaways slots, in this case too, the ways to win are really many, a whopping 46,656! The slot also offers the possibility to activate between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins. The RTP value is 96.03% and the volatility is high, so we will have less frequent wins but very high rewards.

Symbols and functionality

Among the features of Neptune's Fortune Megaways is the cascade function, i.e. after each paying combination, the winning symbols explode and are replaced by others.

The symbols are of low and high value. As usual, the first group includes the playing cards from 10 to Ace, while in the second group we find the thematic icons: the starfish, the shell, the octopus, and Neptune.

The Wild symbol is an oyster with a pearl inside, it replaces all symbols except the Scatter and every time it appears, bubbles rise from its mouth and randomly hit one of the four chests placed above the game grid. Most of the time, the chest will open and give us a multiplier ranging from x2 to x5. If the central chest opens, then we will have the opportunity to win one of the jackpots available:

· Mini: 20x the bet

· Minor: 50x the bet

· Major: 200x the bet

· Grand: 1,000x the bet

The scatter is Neptune's trident: if it appears four times, we get 10 free spins, with five symbols we are entitled to 12 free spins, and with six symbols, the free spins are 15. During free spins, low-value symbols are removed and the Wilds can continue to give us a multiplier as in the base game.

This Megaways game has 46,656 ways to win, and the RTP value is 96.03%, with high volatility. The symbols consist of playing cards, starfish, shells, octopus, and Poseidon, with a wild symbol being an oyster with a pearl inside. The game also has a cascade function, and the wild symbol helps trigger the jackpot feature that includes mini, minor, major, and grand jackpots. The Neptune's trident symbol activates Free Spins with up to 15 available and low-value symbols removed. Experience the thrill of Neptune's Fortune Megaways for a chance to win big!

The RTP value is 96.03%, and the volatility is high, so we'll have less frequent wins but much higher rewards.

Symbols and functionality
Among the features of Neptune's Fortune Megaways is the cascade function, meaning that after each paying combination, winning symbols explode and are replaced by others.

The symbols are of low and high value. As usual, the first group includes playing cards from 10 to Ace, while the second group includes thematic icons: the starfish, the shell, the octopus, and Neptune.

The Wild symbol is an oyster with a pearl inside, substituting for all symbols except the Scatter. Whenever it appears, some bubbles rise from its mouth and randomly hit one of the four chests above the game grid. Most of the time, the chest will open and give us a multiplier between x2 and x5. If the central chest opens, then we will have a chance to win one of the available jackpots:

Mini: 20x the bet
Minor: 50x the bet
Major: 200x the bet
Grand: 1,000x the bet

The Scatter is Neptune's trident: if it appears four times, we get 10 Free Spins, with five symbols, we are entitled to 12 Free Spins, and with six symbols, the Free Spins are 15.

During Free Spins, low-value symbols are removed, and Wilds can continue to give us a multiplier as in the base game. 

Experience the thrill of Neptune's Fortune Megaways and dive into an epic underwater adventure where you can win big!

response.headline: BONUS SYSTEM: All the Pearls and none of the Shucking
response.content: Neptune's Fortune Megaways not only boasts an ocean full of fun but a pearl-fect bonus system. The Wild symbol, a pearl-plucked oyster, can substitute any symbol except the Scatter and can land a multiplier between x2 and x5. But wait, there's more! Just when you thought things couldn't get any better, the central chest opens up to give you a shot at winning the Mini, Minor, Major, or Grand jackpots. What's not to love about being handed a small fortune on a seaweed platter?

response.headline: Mega(t)ways
response.content:
If you are feeling lucky and adventurous, then Neptune’s Fortune Megaways is the slot game for you. With 46,656 ways to win, your chances of winning big are higher than the chances of you hitting every red light on your way to work.

The game spans across 5 reels and its rows can vary between 3 and 6. Think of it as a box of chocolates - you never know what you are going to get. Feeling lazy and want to let fate guide you? Activate between 5 and 1,000 automatic spins and let the universe take the wheel (or rather, the spin).

With an RTP value of 96.03%, you have a good chance of making some serious cash playing this slot game. But be warned - the volatility is high, meaning that you might not win as frequently, but when you do, it’s a big one. It’s like playing the lottery, but you get to enjoy the thrill of the game and the stunning graphics.

response.headline: The Jackpot Hunt
response.content:
Bidding has never been so exciting! Neptune’s Fortune Megaways invites you to hunt for four jackpots while diving into the oceanic depths. Get ready to meet a lovely Mermaid and dive for hidden treasures, including the Mini, Minor, Major, and Grand jackpots.

This adventure guarantees a memorable gaming experience with lots of chances to win big. The Mini jackpot is like finding seashells on the beach, but Major and Grand jackpots are more like discovering an undiscovered sea monster!

Don’t stay high and dry while others catch their lucky break. After the Wild symbol emerges, the central chest opens up, offering a chance to catch any of the available jackpots. With a 1,000x multiplier, the Grand jackpot is waiting to crown the ultimate master of underwater spins.
